title: Best of the Program | Guests: Jason Whitlock & Shannon Bream | 3/29/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss President Biden’s refusal to walk back his dangerous gaffes and the dangers of his rhetoric. Shannon Bream, Fox News Anchor, joins Glenn to discuss her book “The Mothers and Daughters of the Bible Speak: Lessons on Faith from Nine Biblical Families.” BlazeTV host Jason Whitlock of "Fearless" joins to discuss the NFL’s new requirement for all teams to add a minority offensive coach.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
